name: WP Dashboard Cleaner
author: Nilay Patel

sections.description:
The Admin can remove unwanted widgets from your WordPress Dashboard

Using this plugin you can remove below mentioned WordPress’s default dashboard widgets

  • At a Glance
  • Activity
  • WordPress Events & News
  • Quick Draft

Moreover, this plugin allow admin to remove the dashboard widgets created by some popular plugins like Wordfence, Yoast SEO, Broken Link Checker, WooCommerce and Gravity Forms.

  • Yoast SEO Posts Overview
  • Gravity Forms
  • Wordfence activity
  • Broken Link Checker
  • WooCommerce Status
  • WooCommerce Recent Reviews
sections.installation:
1. Extract the zip file into your /wp-content/plugins/ directory or upload through wordpress back end
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Dashboard -> WP Head Optimizer
  4. Remove / Disable the extra added links or ulrs or scripts from WordPress default
  5. You are done. Enjoy Plugin!
sections.faq: If you have any question do let me know on gr8nilay@gmail.com
